# Well-Formed Tables

## Basic Table

| Column 1 | Column 2 | Column 3 |
|----------|----------|----------|
| A        | B        | C        |
| D        | E        | F        |

## Table with Alignment

| Left | Center | Right |
|:-----|:------:|------:|
| L1   |   C1   |    R1 |
| L2   |   C2   |    R2 |

## Table with Varied Content

| Name        | Age | Email               |
|-------------|-----|---------------------|
| Alice Smith | 30  | alice@example.com   |
| Bob Jones   | 25  | bob@example.com     |
| Charlie Lee | 35  | charlie@example.com |
